thread.title: Jennifer Baker
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Jennifer Baker

author: Jennifer Baker
title: Jennifer Baker
text: Was pleased to be able to buy exactly what I needed at such a good price and with next day delivery too. Had a little trouble with delivery as the courier had technical issues but customer services were quick to deal with this. Very happy with The Shower Doctor Ltd and wouldn't hesitate to buy from them again.
